tooltip.relics.acid_walker.description: Allows its owner to safely traverse acidic surfaces, neutralizing harmful effects and providing protection. Grants access to explore radiation hazard zones, making the insurmountable surmountable.
tooltip.relics.acid_walker.ability.walki: For a certain period, allows movement across acid surfaces without sinking into them or sustaining corrosion. After the duration ends, it begins to leave behind a toxic trail, applying acid effects to all living beings.
